对着暴躁的太阳大声吼叫 Bellowing noisily at a truculent Sun

在啄死对手后，傲慢地啼鸣炫耀 Boastfully crowing after pecking a rival to death

威吓一只鲁莽的年轻公鸡 Browbeating an impetuous, younger cockerel
心满意足地咕哝着，翻找散落的种子和小米 Burbling contentedly over strewn seeds and millet

发出鸣叫，与区域内的其他同类进行呼唤回应 Cawing a call-and-response to others in the area
追逐一只受惊的狐狸 Chasing down a frightened Fox

热切地等待着喂养它们的侏儒贤者 Eagerly awaiting the Gnome Sage who feeds them
与骷髅遭遇后容易受惊 Easily spooked after an encounter with Skeletons

对一窝蛋发出鼓励的低语声 Murmuring encouraging noises to a clutch of eggs
